title: Roasted Chantenay carrots tossed in chilli  jam, lemon & thyme

ingredients.item: 2 x 350g packs Trio Of Chantenay Carrots, washed and any large ones halved

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Put the hazelnuts into a small roasting tray and roast for 6-8 minutes until golden. Set aside to cool before roughly chopping.
In a large roasting tin, toss the carrots with the olive oil, season and roast for about 15 minutes.
Take the tray out and stir in the lemon, thyme, garlic, 2 tbsp water and chilli jam. Return to the oven for 20-25 minutes, until the carrots are tender and burnished.
Remove from the oven and sprinkle with the toasted hazelnuts to serve.
